Kiwi model Zoe Brock disgusted by Weinstein’s rape appeal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiwi-harvey-weinstein-metoo-accuser-zoe-brock-on-ex- Producers-rape-appeal/YJPTUMJZM5HRBCEUVZAPRVCBEU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiwi-harvey-weinstein-metoo-accuser-zoe-brock-on-ex- Producers-rape-appeal/YJPTUMJZM5HRBCEUVZAPRVCBEU/ Cherie HowieWomen still face misogyny - she's been called a 'Harvey Weinstein reject', Zoe Brock says. Sat, 27 Apr 2024 02:30:30 +0000 Kiwi model Zoe Brock, pictured in 2020, went public in 2017 with claims former Hollywood movie producer Harvey Weinstein asked her for a massage and chased her into a bathroom. Weinstein was later jailed for rape, with more than 80 accusers coming forward with stories of his behaviour.
Destiny Church member Ashara Kingi jailed for stealing $377,000 from her employer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/destiny-church-member-ashara-kingi-jailed-for-stealing-377000-from-her-employer/NECY5JDQUFFTNAUVF6TGSSQ6GM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/destiny-church-member-ashara-kingi-jailed-for-stealing-377000-from-her-employer/NECY5JDQUFFTNAUVF6TGSSQ6GM/ Sandra Conchie'She was a good actor who portrayed herself as a good Christian woman.' Fri, 26 Apr 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Destiny Church member Ashara Jaymie Kingi, 33, was sentenced to two years and two months jail after stealing $377,167.92 from her employer Larry John O'Neill while employed part-time as his bookkeeper.
